website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy holder offers a nice, clean look that holds up well, even around saltwater.
pros: Mounts vertically or horizontally to boat rails
cons: use a little thread lock to secure them
Put a layer of rubber or tape down before mounting so you won't scratch up your rail

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe the price and quality! Updated 1 year later...
customer_reviews.text: Wow...perfect for my Boston Whaler Outrage. I couldn't really ask for more...fair price...quality product. Many adjustments available so you can get the angle that works best for you. This is a great addition to our Whaler! Pick one up and happy fishing. I just picked up a second rod holder because the first one that’s a year old has held up well and still looks great. See pics for more details- one rod holder is a year old, the other brand new/ I can’t tell the difference. If my review was helpful please consider selecting the helpful button. Thanks and happy and safe boating!
customer_reviews.author: iamnoman

customer_reviews.title: Good but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they didn’t have the protective gasket to protect your rail. My fault for not researching this brand a little better. The quality of the product was very good by why would you want to clamp metal to metal on the rail of a nice boat when there are other vendors selling the same mount with the gasket. Thanks to Amazon very making the exchange super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bowers

customer_reviews.title: It is much heavier duty than you'd expect at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to attach to my son's bicycle so he could carry a fishing rod around. It is TOTALLY inappropriate for this use. The reason it won't work for the bike is that it is so darn heavy duty. For the price, I expected it to be made of chromed plastic (despite claims of stainless steel in the product description). It is definitely sturdy metal. I gave it to my brother for his boat.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality! Can't believe they can sell them for what they do! Keep in mind that the bolts are stainless steel. They are NOT as strong as regular bolts! Don't over tighten them! If you plan on moving them around on your rails, wrap a single layer of rubber around the rail first to keep them from scratching. I used a piece of scrap rubber roofing and cut small strips. It helps to keep them from rotating also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on my offshore boat about 3 years ago. They mount easy, stay in place and haven't rusted at all, which is amazing.. I keep the boat moored in salt water about 4 months a year and have made at least 50 trips off the Coast of Oregon out the mouth of the Columbia river, rough conditions with salt water soaking them down each trip.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: i never expected this rod holder to last more than a few months just because it's a cheap one!! Had it for 2 years now holding heavy gear in rough seas and it still is in perfect condition no rust at all!! buying more for my boat and i do highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Redsea Jigger

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably solid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to mount on my bike. For the price I thought it would be a piece of junk. Reality is this could go on any high end fishing boat and fit right in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Supertramp

customer_reviews.title: A true American made bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to affix a solar umbrella to an astronomy chair so I wouldn't bake in the sun while viewing the sun through my solar scope. It is perfect for that use. it is incredibly well made, easy to install and good to look at. it will last forever. I imagine it does well, too, for its original purpose as a fishing rod clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: Initially a nice clamp on stainless steel rod holder you can easily place on any rail on your boat. However, after one year of use the plastic in the bottom broke and therm couldn't stabilize a fishing rod. Now I have to drill holes to accommodate a long bolt so it can hold the gimbel in place to prevent a trolling rod from shifting. Suggest to company to use metal on the bottom instead of plastic. If you're not handy, you just wasted your money on this rod holder. I would appreciate a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kassimir

customer_reviews.title: I fish salt water and this still looks good .
customer_reviews.text: I fish in salt water and have had one for 7 months so far no rust and plastic insert has held up well .. easy to attach and swivel different directions all you need is an allen wrench .Ive hooked 50 lb plus fish on this while in rod was in holder no problems . I just ordered one more you can't beat the price ! Highly recommend this and i fish hard and long .. Tight lines and big fish to all .
customer_reviews.author: Fishin  magician

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holders.
customer_reviews.text: Quality and solid rod holders. My boat only came with 4 built-in rod holders, so I added two of these and two others of a different brand and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking product. Sturdy when mounted
customer_reviews.text: Second order for a total of 3 of these items purchased. Installed on 1 on a boat rail and 2 on a bimini frame easily and they look like original equipment. Built solid and easily adjustable. Recommend wrapping rails with tape or in my case I used plumbers leak tape as it adheres without leaving adhesive residue. Avoids scratching the rail. Hopefully will hold up in use
customer_reviews.author: Hamstrings

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fit nicely for a great price. I bought one first and then bought a second for my boat. Saltwater has not bothered them thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Troach11

customer_reviews.title: This fit the bill for me. I know there ...
customer_reviews.text: This fit the bill for me. I know there are some very pricey versions of this style holder out there but you are not going to beat this one for fit function and price.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Should have bought two
customer_reviews.text: Good product - Should have bought two. When that 50lb Dolphin hit the line on the other side of the boat (from the new holder) it took the rod, reel and old mount right off the station.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I've bought three to use on my hand rails. Versatile, well made, ... does the job.
customer_reviews.author: George Brannen

customer_reviews.title: They are really pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: They are actually pretty good to be so inexpensive. They mounted easily to my boat rail and work great. I would never troll with them but for a good place to puy your rod while you get underway, They are great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, we'd buy these again
customer_reviews.text: We mounted these on our boat for holding poles and it's as if we have an extra hand or two. Well built and have held up for a couple of seasons so far and look no worse for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rod holders.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rod holders. They hold tight and Im not worried of these working itself loose on a rough fishing trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mcruz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rod holders for Saltwater boat.
customer_reviews.text: Have 6 on my boat. 4 on the t top and two on the front rails. No rust or pitting after 6 months with boat on saltwater on a lift. Better than the west marine brand in my opinion. Cant go wrong for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Best rod holders out there
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these on my boat. They are really easy to install and are incredibly secure. I would recommend this to anyone looking to add more rod holders.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: It'll do the job.
customer_reviews.text: wgen you look at them they look clean looking. The plastic bottom has some manufacturing defects where the drain holes are. But not that big of a deal. You will need two different size Allen keys for adjustments. Wish it was just one size so can attach and make adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic rod holder. My pontoon is set up mainly for cruising and skiing and there were limited options on where to mount rod holders. This clamp on is good looking and its adjustable angles allowed me to mount on the ski pylon braces. It looks like an OEM installation.
customer_reviews.author: f j dis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a very inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a very inexpensive price! Very well pleased and plan to purchase several more for my fishing friends and family. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rexford M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Quality addition to boat.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Well made, easy to install, works great and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Rod holder Does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install but not worth it. Very good price for item. Very good quality but it does not hold the screws in. I have tried over ten times but it just not stay on. I have super glued and taped and it stuff falls off. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great value for a full size stainless steel adjustable rail mount rod holder..Not sure what size allen wrench is correct fit for mounting...no product info included...Good value .....Dave Murray
customer_reviews.author: David S Murray

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my 97 Bass Tracker Pro Angler V16 Haven't had it on the lake, tightens up very securely, might order another one for the other side.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Byfield

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my boat. Very nice quality, very easy to install. They are a very good value. I only put them on the end of the season, so I can't attest to their durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: GWH

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and it is stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a rod holder to be able to store a few more rods on my center console boat. I ordered two of these. Easy installation and it is stainless steel! Looks perfect on my boat!. Easily adjustable, mounts secure, and holds rods nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Poling

customer_reviews.title: To good to be true
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Stainless, heavy duty. Hardware is also stainless and sized appropriatly. The Tungue and groove adjustable fitting allows for dual axis positioning. I bought for 25lb test sized trolling and have no concerns. They look like they will last the life of my boat. They really are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Onlnshppr36

customer_reviews.title: Put them on my boat chair and they make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my boat chair and they make it a lot easier reaching for your pole and gives you the freedom to eat your lunch
customer_reviews.author: alexander f wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have several boats, I fish ALOT!!! these are way better quality than I expected for the price. Only Wish they had the locking pin in the bottom or I would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These rod holders are very well made and very adjustable. I orgjnally bought another clamp on version which was flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Westside Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holders to keep rods out of the way
customer_reviews.text: Great rod holders to keep rods out of the way, or wait for a strike with a loose drag. But would not recommend using it to help fight a fish, i would take it out once you are going to start fighting.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Seirren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are great, easy to clamp-on. Not the high-end ones, but work well. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Late_to_the_Party

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as an umbrella holder for my disc golf cart, works like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 then once they arrived bought 2 more. Great value for the money. Look good. Can mount to T Top or front guide rail. I put a little rubber on the mounts for bow rail.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. nice product . Held up well in the salt water the first season.
customer_reviews.author: Marbles

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Not alot I can say here they work great quality materials and they look good on the boat no problems
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: These where perfect for my husbands fishing trip
customer_reviews.text: These where perfect for my husbands fishing trip! He really likes them and they held up very good and he will continue to use them. They still look brand new after five days of fishing! Good purchase, I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually decent rod holders just put lock tight on the bolts prior to installation
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sports

customer_reviews.title: Solid rod holder
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this rod holder to mu round boat rail, had to add a couple washers under each screw to keep the screws from bottoming out before clamping properly. Overall has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Palms Creations

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have others on boat:name brand",these are the same! quarter the price!
customer_reviews.author: mike olsen

customer_reviews.title: Great construction
customer_reviews.text: This is built like a tank. I actually use it for an umbrella holder on a golf cart, but I also do ALOT of fishing. This is very wel made and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: There Rod /Net holders are great and hold up in salt or fresh water. I originally purchased two at Wallyworld, but they are apparently for anyone to carry them locally including the local boating and sporting goods store... Well worth the investment and a GREAT Price !
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Problem with closed bottom solved with wack of a hammer, plactic breaks easily, then clean up edges with Dremel burring bit. Inside diameter too small for some poles, had to remove some material from pole bottom knob. Looks great and functions well after previous adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Notchman

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've installed multiples of these on the T-Top frames of our Lodge's ocean-going fishing boats. These are well made and economical. Very useful to keep rods out of the way when they aren't in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnatus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, appear well made
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice, appear well made. The screws were too long to mount it on my cart like i wanted though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To short and don't have the screw on the button ...
customer_reviews.text: To short and don't have the screw on the button to support de rod, sure be change the bottom plastic end for a screw to support the rod.
customer_reviews.author: White Bulled

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty rod holders!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rod holders! The screws need to be longer to mount up to pontoon rails though!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Chucks

customer_reviews.title: black inside(other one was white and a little bigger)but great quality.
customer_reviews.text: second one,black inside(other one was white and a little bigger)but great quality.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These stainless rod holders are holding up well on my center console. I only wish the bottom was slotted so rods didn't rotate when bouncing over rough seas.
customer_reviews.author: T Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well made, simple to install, does what it is supposed to do. I clamped this onto the brace of a ski two bar on a pontoon boat.
customer_reviews.author: joseph j bongiovanni jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality Rod holder. Ordered 2 and just now ordered 2 more. Heavy very well made rod holder.
customer_reviews.author: OneXBigTom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: we use these for lake fishing on our pontoon boat. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Mason

customer_reviews.title: Sting & attractive
customer_reviews.text: Added this one to the 20 year old Perko already installed, it's identical. They're strong and attractive, much more secure than the oarlock receiver type.
customer_reviews.author: P. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Made flagpole holder with it
customer_reviews.text: Used this to mount to my camper ladder to hold a flagpole/antenna. Worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Derek Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fish holder to clamp onto your bow rails. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: TwinRock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Easy to install. Does the job. Strongly recommend this rod holder to anyone in the market
customer_reviews.author: JCL Consult

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: USE IT ON MY GRANDSON'S WHEELCHAIR......WHEN I RAISE THE ARM OF THE WHEECHAIR UP, I CAN ALSO USE IT TO PUT AN UMBRELLA IN TO SHIELD FROM SUN OR RAIN......THAT WAS A PLEASANT SUPRISE
customer_reviews.author: Donnaf Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on high end rod holders, this is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: You won't find a nicer or better made rod holder for the money. Tightens/adjust with an Allen wrench. Holds up well with saltwater. I love it so much a bought a total of 4! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffexit7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best machine finished rod holders for the money Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dermot Johnston

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT♡ THIS IS A QUALITY PIECE OF CRAFTMANSSHIP
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT♡ THIS IS A QUALITY PIECE OF CRAFTMANSSHIP. LOOKS BADSSS, AND REALLY DOES THE JOB. THANKS FOR A GREAT PRODUCT☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Prince

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paid twice the price for the other brand. This is very well made and should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holder !!! Great price !!
customer_reviews.text: Great price ! West Marine charges twice as much , for the same item !!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Maisack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several and they work, but metal tarnished after one season
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little better than expected. Construction is good, and work well. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: ousie

customer_reviews.title: ... on the bridge of my boat and they work great! Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I installed 9 of these on the bridge of my boat and they work great! Awesome price, high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: mounted great looks freat showed up on time . I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L Runge

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Added a total of 10 to the boat layout. Keeps the deck clear when fighting the fish or bringing one on board.
customer_reviews.author: Ron R.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and priced well under most marine stores
customer_reviews.text: Well made , sturdy and priced well under most marine stores.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Hill

customer_reviews.title: For the money it's a good deal. Higher quality units are more expensive
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's a good deal. Higher quality units are more expensive. I've seen them at West Marine and other supply places.
customer_reviews.author: David Kleyn

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: much better than the other brand that i purchased along with it. looks and feels top quality for a fraction of the price. have had it in the elements for 2 months and no sign of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanjpowers

customer_reviews.title: connections break at speed.
customer_reviews.text: die cast bolts break when hitting moderate chop at speed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds rods where you place the holder very well. Dont rust. Rods seem secure even in high waves!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Michael Wiesner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed. Used for flag poles to decorate boats for boat parades.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Identical to much more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rod holder to match the West Marine one already in our new boat (to hold a solar light and, occasionally, an actual fishing rod). Other than the small West Marine logo and the $80 price tag, this one is identical.
customer_reviews.author: Gearry Caudell

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. I bought two and mounted to rear ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I bought two and mounted to rear ski bar.Solid Mounting would not hesitate buying this pole holder.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Richardson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit 1in diameter rail. Screws were siezed in clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Heavy duty. Much nicer than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Samboney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well built, nice looking, and easy to install. Will be purchasing more of these. Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: SERGIO AVILA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great stainless steel rod holder. cant beat the price cheapest i found.
customer_reviews.author: thomas phlegar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband--he loves it and it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Jules W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pole holder, heavy stainless steel. Used red loctite on the bolts, have fished off shore . Not loosening.
customer_reviews.author: doug eidsmoe

customer_reviews.title: wish I bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my boat. I clamped 2 on to the cooler seat on my boat. Gonna order 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Les Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Everything they said it was.Very easy to install and looks great. Can be used for much more then just a fishing pole.
customer_reviews.author: SgtMike

customer_reviews.title: was able to easily adjust and secure to boat in a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: solid product, durable and well built. was able to easily adjust and secure to boat in a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Great product. Well made. Quality. West Marine would charge double! I have had these on my ocean fishing kayak for over a year and the salt water hasn't phased them. Still perfect. They attach beautifully on the kayak seat frame and enable me to troll from both sides while pedaling my Hobie. These are a real bargain and you will love them. Hobie needs to check them out-they haven't addressed the rod holder issue adequately and these rod holders are made to order. There is a huge kayak fishing market to be tapped.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Its been out in the salt for a few trips and no rust or other complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: John Vitiello

customer_reviews.title: Deal
customer_reviews.text: Same as at big Marine store , $48 less for two.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Renfroe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, same ones at local stores for half the cost
customer_reviews.author: D. Henley

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: ordered two to mount on the railings on my whaler to do some fishing for tunas and mahimahi, surprisingly enough they held up great and can adjust to any situation so i keep a spare allen wrench in the boat if need. in heavy waves may have to retighten once in a great while but if you go over your whole boat before the trip like you should its not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Boap(as my son says)

customer_reviews.title: Thought they were great! Until the bolts securing the clamp on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were great! Until the bolts securing the clamp on the rail sheared in half and it went to the bottom of the Chesapeake. I made it home with one. Thankfully I didn't have a rod in it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron  Abes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Wish they were a little deeper so ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Wish they were a little deeper so rods go in further.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered about a dozen of these for my Lake Erie Charter boat the "Erie Breeze" clients love how easy it is to use and they are durable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Old Lakeshore Charters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. They are well made and bolted on easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. They are well made and bolted on easily to my "T-Top".
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Latzke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, clamped right on no problems. Holds the fishing poles well!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, its a rod holder! Does what it is supose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E Tiller

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: they loosen up one fell off my rail and in the road on my way home from the launch ramp. I used lock tight but what happens the mounting hole get stretched or the bolt gets stretched. I only used them to troll with and the ones I got from west marine cost more but I have had zero issues with. don't waste your hard earned cash on these guys
customer_reviews.author: harry archond

product_meta.title: Amarine Made Stainless Clamp on Fishing Rod Holder for Rails 22mm (7/8") to 25mm (1") diam
product_meta.description: Color:Silver, 7/8" to 1"| Size:7/8" To 1"Product Description This product is a 100% brand new Amarine-madeTM product 1 x high quality, marine grade 304 stainless steel rod holder with marine grade 316 Stainless steel clamp-on mounting bracket Mirror finished stainless steel construction , for sleek appearance and to suit today's modern watercraft Rubber insert to protect your fishing rod from any wear against the stainless surface Can be mounted to vertical or horizontal rails - Adjustable for rails 22mm (7/8") to 25mm (1") diam. Rod holder can be adjusted to 32 different angles when mounted Easy to install, mounting bracket includes bolts (allen key not included) Stopper slot built into the base of the rod holder to located the rod butt into position Drain holes at base of rod holder to drain any captured water Ideal for fishing boats with rails, where gunwale space may be limited Specifications 1 x marine grade 304 stainless steel rod holder with marine grade 316 clamp-on bracket 1 x Rubber insert (fitted) Tube length 230mm (9") Inside diameter 42mm Outside tube diameter 52mm this is product branded amarine-made
feature_bullets: This product is a 100% brand new Amarine-made product
Can be mounted to vertical or horizontal rails - Adjustable for rails 22mm (7/8") to 25mm (1") diam
Rubber insert to protect your fishing rod from any wear against the stainless surface
Rod holder can be adjusted to 32 different angles when mounted;Easy to install, mounting bracket includes bolts (allen key not included).

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
